"The Shelter" is a story told in a post-apocalyptic New York. On the Trail of a terrible natural disaster, a group of people have to hide in the basement of a building. Staying in this space is the only way to stay oblivious of the consequences of this catastrophe, but another problem arises: how to live in harmony without food, water or any kind of structure?
